title: Bride-to-be's engagement ring is mocked online for 'looking like a sperm wrapped around her finger'
text:
A bride-to-be's engagement ring has been mocked online as social media users compare the sparkler to looking like 'sperm wrapped around her finger.'

The anonymous woman, believed to be from the US, seemed to be delighted after her other half popped the question - and excitedly took to Facebook to show off the new addition to her hand.

However, the gold ring, which features a snake design, didn't receive the positive response she'd desired and instead, quickly found itself onto the group, 'That's It, I'm Ring Shaming.'

'So her fiancé looked at her and thought "snake?" Interesting,' wrote one, while a second asked: 'Is that a sperm?'

An anonymous woman, believed to be from the US, shared a photo of her unique engagement ring on social media

The snap quickly found itself onto Facebook group, 'That's It, I'm Ring Shaming,' where many compared it to looking like 'sperm'

A third added: ''Tis the King Sperm. From this beast was birthed the world's worst idea, giving anyone that ring.'

The woman in question posted a snap of her ring alongside the captions: "I SAID YAASSS" and "Mrs Fiancée."

But the ring's unusual snake design features a diamond-studded head and a thin tail which wraps around her her engagement finger - leading many to draw the unfortunate comparisons.

'You beat me to the sperm comparison,' wrote one, while another agreed: 'It looks like a weird sperm.'

Many compared the snake design of the ring to looking like ''sperm wrapped around her finger' (pictured)

Opening up the opportunity to further criticise the engagement ring, one woman replied: 'You should've said NO.'

And within minutes, the post was flooded with comments slamming the design of the rather unusual-looking sparkler.

'I'd say run sister. What satanic serpent cult is this ring from?' penned one, while another wrote: 'You should have said "you a**" bring me something decent!'

A further rather simply questioned: ''The hell is that?'
description: An anonymous bride-to-be, from the US, has been mocked online after sharing a picture of her snake design engagement ring. Many said it looked like 'sperm wrapped around her finger.'
